item.title: Pure Chaos
item.description: Chaos Engineering is the discipline of experimenting on a system in order to build confidence in the system’s capability to withstand turbulent conditions in production.

item.title: Python Pipeline to Kubernetes
item.description: This lab will take you through a recipe for delivering a microservice based on Python to Kubernetes.
